data.app_name: Sugar Mess - Let's Play Jolly Battle Demo
data.description:
# Sugar Mess - Let's Play Jolly Battle Demo is a fun arcade first-person shooter for the whole family!

**The full version of the game is already available: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/3938584826225957/**


Embark on a journey through the amazing levels of the Sugar Kingdom! Fend off the attacks of hilarious yummy enemies that shatter into pieces on impact!
Make use of your vast arsenal of weapons that get stronger as you use them. Use special items to gain an advantage over your opponents.

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75203625_1677176532815625_5851391393046856758_n.png?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=z9qoDr1xzCoQ7kNvgGJXRox&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Alet-MdWtx4SEtO2V_0KKq4&oh=00_AYA02RV97XfbNMhejjJE95Ye4kkyPKwv4Km_3pcQpo-tlw&oe=66E7F4E1)

In the full version of the game, other exciting activities are waiting for you! Solve challenging puzzles, ride in a unique vehicle around the kingdom, feel the rhythm and participate in musical performances! 

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031449_7609212875839858_337394528556527528_n.png?_nc_cat=101&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=k6oVAuDqhOIQ7kNvgGWNQ0E&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Alet-MdWtx4SEtO2V_0KKq4&oh=00_AYC3peKFUsp0T9nZst25HWKEzvUVNSYMTyZqgwSCuOUdQg&oe=66E812C7)

Dive into a fairy tale world and find out the exciting story of the Sugar Prince and his mysterious enemy!
